name: It's fine
description:
Your goal is to deliver a package to its destination. The only courier ship available to you is one the last ships fueled by fossil fuels. It was the cheapest you could get at short notice. You must make sure to manage everything to make sure the ship and package remain intact at the end of your journey. You must fight pirates, roaches and time. You can do it! 

All sprites created by me (except cat poster).

Sound files taken from freesound. Creators listed in Credits.txt
